phase2.title: Execution & Upside
phase2.body: Joint execution against agreed levers. Fees align to realized operational and financial outcomes, not hours logged.

engagement.disclaimer: This isn't a free workshop. It's a structured, capital-protected diagnostic where both sides put skin in the game. If the upside isn't there, you walk away with clarity—not a sunk fee stack. If we proceed, we transition into a shared-reward model that links our economics to the realized EBITDA and working capital improvements.

items.a: We absorb the initial capex. We deploy our team to audit your operations at our cost (you only cover travel expenses). If we don't present a validated ROI roadmap greater than our fee, the engagement ends at zero cost to you.

items.q: What happens if no savings are found?
items.a: Then we have failed our mission, and you owe us nothing for the diagnostic time. However, in our history across automotive and logistics sectors, we have never failed to uncover 'hidden factory' costs.

items.q: How long is a typical engagement?
items.a: The 'Signal Check' diagnostic is 2-4 weeks. Full embedded transformation projects typically run 6-18 months depending on the scope (e.g., full ERP integration vs. single line balancing).

items.q: Do you integrate with our existing IT teams?
items.a: Yes. We work 'Embedded'. That means we sit in your stand-ups, use your Jira/Teams, and respect your governance. We are not a shadow IT force; we are an acceleration layer.
Our core DNA is heavy industry: Automotive, Industrial Manufacturing, Logistics/3PL, Pharma/Life Sciences, and large-scale Retail Supply Chain.
